titleStmt.title: Funerall elegies vpon the most lamentable and vntimely death of the thrice illustrious Prince Henry, Prince of VVales, &c. By R.A.
titleStmt.author: Allyne, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] P[urfoot] for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at his shop at Brittaines Burse,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
